# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maximize the return on our investment. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be securing not only a high-quality product but also a chance to benefit from our commitment to customer satisfaction. We look forward to hearing your decision soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
